DOC.brief_summary: Randomized control non-inferiority trial compare therapist-guided Internet-based Cognitive behavioral therapy ( ICBT ) , self-guided ICBT , individual face-to-face ( f2f ) CBT Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder ( OCD ) adult . The primary objective evaluate whether ICBT non-inferior treatment option compare best possible available treatment OCD , individual face face ( f2f ) CBT . A second objective compare efficacy self-guided vs. therapist-guided ICBT . As question cost implication health system , third objective carry health economic evaluation form ICBT , relation gold standard f2f CBT . A fourth objective explore whether ICBT equally suit clinic-referred case compare self-referred patient . Finally , fifth objective investigate whether genetic marker , combination clinical variable , employ predict treatment outcome CBT general . Research Questions : Q1 : Is therapist-guided internet-based CBT ( ICBT ) OCD non-inferior face-to-face ( f2f ) CBT regard OCD symptom , function quality life ? Q2 : Is entirely self-guided ICBT non-inferior f2f CBT regard OCD symptom , function quality life ? Q3 : Is ICBT cost-effective treatment , compare f2f CBT ? Q4 : Is difference treatment outcome self-referred clinical refer patient ? Q5 : Can clinical variable genetic marker useful predict patient benefit CBT ?
DOC.brief_title: Internet-based v Face-to-face Cognitive Behavioural Therapy Obsessive-compulsive Disorder
